name: Goldflame Tajine
desc: Dehya's specialty. As you open the unassuming lid, you are greeted with supple meat that turns out to be so tender that one could get drunk on the sensation of it slipping between your lips... It seems that Dehya's dab kitchen hand is as steady as her sword-arm.

customize.name: Recipe: Gilded Tajine
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Gilded Tajine.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Padisarah
customize.desc: A holy and noble plant. The conditions for growth in its environment are very demanding. The flower buds can be processed to make valuable spices.

customize.name: Spice
customize.desc: A seasoning with varied flavors. It is made from dried Harra Fruits and can enrich the taste of a dish. Therefore, Sumeru locals say, "Spice goes well with anything."

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Gilded Tajine
customize.desc: A stewed meat dish. The unique hat-shaped pot cover is capable of reducing the amount of moisture lost during the stewing process â€” a culinary secret known only to the desert folk. This delicious delicacy has followed the gilded Eremites all over Sumeru, and thus did it gain its name and fame.

customize.name: Dehya
customize.desc: A member of the Eremites, a mercenary organization that roams the sands of Sumeru. Valiant and powerful, she enjoys great fame amongst her fellow Eremites.

value.text: Increases all party members' Max HP by 30% for 300s. In Co-op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
